RISK_ASSESSMENT.deal_risk_explanation: The deal is experiencing significant objections related to pricing and budget constraints, with the prospect setting a strict budget limit.
RISK_ASSESSMENT.churn_risk_explanation: High likelihood of switching to competitors due to dissatisfaction with pricing and perceived value.
RISK_ASSESSMENT.timeline_risk_explanation: Concerns about implementation complexity and timeline have been raised, indicating potential delays.
RISK_ASSESSMENT.budget_risk_explanation: The prospect has expressed firm budget limitations, increasing the risk of budget-related issues.

ACTIVITY_ANALYSIS.last_touch_summary: The last communication involved the prospect raising multiple objections regarding pricing and implementation.

event.event_description: Prospect raised concerns about pricing and budget limitations.
Rep offered solutions to address objections and committed to revising the proposal.
Follow-up to discuss revised proposal and address ongoing concerns.

AI_GENERATED_SUMMARY: The deal is currently in a negotiation stage with significant objections from the prospect regarding pricing and implementation timelines. The prospect has set a strict budget limit and has indicated a willingness to pause discussions until their leadership shows further interest. The engagement trend is declining, and the deal is at high risk due to unresolved objections and budget constraints.

Next_Steps: Revise the proposal to meet budget constraints
Schedule a follow-up meeting to discuss the revised proposal
Prepare to address objections regarding implementation complexity
RECOMMENDATIONS.Escalation_Triggers: If the prospect does not respond within a week after the follow-up proposal is sent.
RECOMMENDATIONS.Deal_Acceleration_Tactics: Offer a limited-time discount or additional value-add services to incentivize the prospect.

Email_Draft.subject: Follow-Up on Marketing Cloud Lite Proposal
Email_Draft.body:
Hi Emily,

I wanted to follow up on our recent discussions regarding the Marketing Cloud Lite proposal. I understand that pricing and implementation timelines are critical concerns for you. We are committed to addressing these issues and would love to schedule a time to discuss a revised proposal that aligns with your budget and needs.

Please let me know your availability for a follow-up meeting.

Best,
Bruce

AI_GENERATED_FOLLOW_UP.Slack_Message: Hi Emily, just checking in to see if you have any updates on the proposal discussions. Let me know if you'd like to set up a time to talk!
